20101218074145.000|20101218074147.000|CCO|OH, AND AT A SHOPPING MALL IN 
20101218074147.000|20101218074149.000|CCO|BOCA RATON FLORIDA, THEY HAVE 
20101218074149.000|20101218074151.000|CCO|AN ATM MACHINE THAT DISPENSES 
20101218074151.000|20101218074152.250|CCO|GOLD BARS INSTEAD OF CASH.

20101218074154.750|20101218074156.000|CCO|24 KARAT GOLD BARS COME OUT OF

20101218074157.250|20101218074158.500|CCO|THIS IS GREAT FOR RETIRES WHO 
20101218074158.500|20101218074159.750|CCO|FEEL THEY'RE NOT A BIG ENOUGH
